about_the_game:
PEACE BREEDS COMPLACENCY

When royal guards Frey and Kyslar attend the prince's wedding, they expect nothing more than a peaceful ceremony. But amidst the celebration, dark omens are ignored.

As the kingdom descends into turmoil, they cling to the last glimmers of hope, seeking the truth to prevent an inevitable war. What begins as a routine event soon pulls Frey, Kyslar, and a group of outcasts, between pirates and prisoners, into a conflict that has been quietly brewing for far too long. Now, they must rise as unlikely heroes to confront the forces threatening to tear their world apart.

START FROM SCRATCH AND BECOME A HERO WITH TACTICAL RPG COMBAT

Dive into intense JRPG tactical combat, where every action can alter the course of battle.

Master diverse magic types and unleash unique abilities for each character as you navigate a war-torn world filled with peril. Face challenging foes, where even the smallest enemy can deal devastating blows, and carve your path to victory in a land where every decision counts.

UNLIMITED ADVENTURE

Embark on an adventure across a vibrant fantasy island and uncover all it has to offer.

Unforgettable moments await at every turn, with exciting activities like Blackjack, Fishing, and Whack-a-Mole, along with side quests that can even influence the main storyline!

Key Features:

  • 7-10 hours of playtime

    Dive into a captivating experience with a playtime that keeps you engaged from start to finish, in a game that aims to have engaging hours instead of a prolonged void time.

  • Unravel the mystery behind the attack on a royal wedding

    Embark on a journey to uncover secrets and save a kingdom teetering on the edge of ruin.

  • Revamped turn-based combat

    Enjoy a dynamic turn-based battle system, enhanced with Quick Time Events, to boost your attack, and dodge enemy attacks, keeping every encounter exciting!

  • Strategic status effects

    Apply statuses and debuffs that even work on bosses, adding depth to your combat strategies.

  • Branching side quests

    Complete side quests that can directly influence and alter the main story!

  • Multiple routes and endings

    Explore the main narrative with 3 distinct routes and uncover 9 different endings based on your choices.

name: Fading Voices

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display

short_description: Fading Voices plays like Final Fantasy + Like a Dragon. Explore twisting caverns and dense forests, squaring up against filthy creatures, bizarre monsters, and elite soldiers across a vast island at war in turn-based tactical combat, and decide the story with a few key decisions.
supported_languages: English, Italian, German, French, Spanish - Spain
